description.originalText: Kristy G. was a great help to me this summer. I was working, and needed to hire someone to pick up my 12 year old daughter from my house and drive her to a Summer camp, and at times take her home, as well. Kristy was a dependable, reliable person-always punctual, and very positive. It was a comfort knowing my daughter was taken care of.

Kristy has been extremely helpful in helping me care for my child. Our daughters are friends and she has assisted in getting her from school for me and caring for her until I got home from work. She has assisted with hw and organized outfits for planned school events. She is a wonderful asset to my family.

description.displayText: Kristy has been babysitting our son (who is now almost 3) since he was less than a year old. She is great with both babies and toddlers and has taken him to the playground, classes, museums and the library. Sh We highly recommend her to any one looking for a babysitter.
description.originalText: Kristy has been babysitting our son (who is now almost 3) since he was less than a year old. She is great with both babies and toddlers and has taken him to the playground, classes, museums and the library. Sh We highly recommend her to any one looking for a babysitter.

description.displayText: Kristy is the BEST care-taker that we have had for my two-year old daughter and we could not have been happier with her! She is energetic, fun, smart, responsible, and was there for my daughter 120%. She took her on many fun outings, looked out for her growth (helped her with her developing speech) and was truly a wonderful addition to our family.  She always arrived early and you could count on her for anything. Her daughter is a doll and became great friends with my daughter. We are so sad that she is moving and whatever family she helps out in Chicago is really lucky!
description.originalText: Kristy is the BEST care-taker that we have had for my two-year old daughter and we could not have been happier with her! She is energetic, fun, smart, responsible, and was there for my daughter 120%. She took her on many fun outings, looked out for her growth (helped her with her developing speech) and was truly a wonderful addition to our family.  She always arrived early and you could count on her for anything. Her daughter is a doll and became great friends with my daughter. We are so sad that she is moving and whatever family she helps out in Chicago is really lucky!

description.displayText: I can't say enough positive things about Kristy! She began with my family when my boys were 1 and 3, and was with us for 2 days a week for about 9 months. Kristy is amazing with my sons. My oldest tells me that Kristy is his favorite babysitter/nanny, in fact he is often more excited to spend the day with her than me. During the winter she was always prepared with a craft or an activity, and during warmer weather they were out at a park, having water play, or on a play date. Kristy was never late, I came home to find a house cleaner than I left it, and other moms who saw Kristy out with my children commented on how lucky I was to have found her. I trusted Kristy to drive with my children both to go to activities and pick up my son from preschool. Kristy is warm, caring, fun, and also professional. I know that your children will love her as much as mine do.

description.displayText: Kristy is the best caregiver I could have ever have hoped for my two-year old daughter! We LOVE her. She is loving, energetic, fun, smart, sweet, and so giving. She is also 120% reliable, punctual (always early), and is devoted to the child and family she takes on. She was always giving new experiences to my daughter, taking her to museums, parks and on various outings, as well as bringing fun crafts to do. We are so sad that she and her daughter are moving (her daughter is adorable and is my daughter's best friend) but are grateful that we had them in our lives for a year. We hit the jackpot when we contacted her.

description.displayText: Kristy is one of my favorite sitters. My daughter and I both love her. She always engages my daughter immediately, does fun and creative activities. I love having Kristy watch my daughter because I know I will come home to a happy girl.
description.originalText: Kristy is one of my favorite sitters. My daughter and I both love her. She always engages my daughter immediately, does fun and creative activities. I love having Kristy watch my daughter because I know I will come home to a happy girl.

description.displayText: Kristy was kind and understanding of my Mom worries and my son just adored her!  So grateful for her time!
description.originalText: Kristy was kind and understanding of my Mom worries and my son just adored her!  So grateful for her time!

description.displayText: Kristy is an outstanding caregiver and mom.  After watching her care for other kids, I have used her to watch my 2 year old and would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a caregiver. She is exceptionally responsible and exercises good judgement regularly.  She is fully capable of watching multiple children at once and my son absolutely adores her.

After watching her care for other kids, I have used her to watch my 2 year old and would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a caregiver. She is exceptionally responsible and exercises good judgement regularly.  She is fully capable of watching multiple children at once and my son absolutely adores her.

description.displayText: Kristy has been caring for my 2 yo daughter for the past 7 months and she has been wonderful!  I can tell she really cares about my daughter and treats her like her own.  Her daughter and my daughter are best friends and they play very well together.  My daughter is always happy to go over to their house.  Kristy was very very flexible and accommodating. The only reason we will not be using her anymore is because we are moving out of state.  My daughter and I will miss her and her daughter!
